creator: opensrc888@yahoo.com
text:
Tomcat currently supports JSSE and operates only on JKS or PKCS12 format
keystores. This enhancement is to have Tomcat to support JSS which implements
cryptographic operations in native code using the NSS libraries. JSS is also
FIPS compliant.
Can you please clarify what you mean?  What would you like to be able to do?
creator: yoavs@computer.org

text:
It isn't clear to me from the JSS/NSS docs if it integrates sufficiently with JSSE that no changes are required in Tomcat.

Either way, I don;t recall seeing any interest in this from the user community so resolving this as won't fix.
creator: markt@apache.org
